official-title.#text:
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to authorize the extension of the initial
			 open enrollment period for up to 1 month, and for other purposes.

text.#text:
For purposes of imposing a penalty under this section for taxable year 2014, the amount of the
			 penalty to be imposed shall not include any month ending on or before the
